column3:
comment:"I'm satisfied with the product and it is a nice purchase. had some scratches in the fridge and on edge of the inside glass door. pic not attached. 
This is the official Dawlance Pakistan store.
2 Buttons behind to control the cold and hot water. (should introduce light switch)
The Water taps
column4:
hot and cold water taps work great. If you don't use the warm/cold water tape too much then the warm water tap will be a little bit chill.
They are magnetic in both doors to close them. Rubber around the fridge.
The Fridge temp around 12-18C and normally i see 15-17C (in November while hardly using the water tap n opening the fridge door)
This Water Dispenser isn't for those who want chilled drinks
column7: and don't want to buy a room fridge.  It will be normal cold after a few hours but not chilled. Maybe the same for other dispensers.\nThe compressor doesn't run regularly if the water is not depleted much. Good feature to save electricity and its life."}
column10: comment:"Very good product and build quality. Highly recommended. Seller response and guidance is much appreciated. Thank you."}
